title: BN Diagnostics – Business Landing Page
description: Built and deployed a responsive single-page website for a diagnostic laboratory business. Integrated WhatsApp chat and appointment booking; designed for mobile-first responsiveness.
highlight: Deployed on Vercel with fast loads and mobile-first UI for better conversions.

title: Product Store – Backend Web Application
description: Developed a backend inventory management service with full CRUD operations and RESTful APIs. Focused on data validation and reliability.

title: Online Shopping – Full Stack Application
description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product browsing, and cart features. Designed REST APIs for seamless data flow.
